text: This section describes how to manage pico configurations in Pico Management screen in Desktop. To open the Pico Management screen, click on the Manage screen option in Desktop and then click on the Pico Management button. Open Pico Management You can perform the following operations on the Pico Management page: View, update, and create Picos Start, stop, and restart Picos This chapter includes the following sections: Starting, Stopping and Restarting Picos View, Update, Create, and Delete Picos
title: Managing Picos in Desktop - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
